name: Sine and Cosine values on the unit circle
description: This tutorial will help you learn the values of Sine and Cosine on the unit circle.

pages.textBefore: In trigonometry, the unit circle is the circle of radius 1 centered at the origin. The coordinates of a point at an angle are (cosΘ, sinΘ)
pages.textAfter: This image shows the exact coordinates of some angles on the unit circle. It is helpful to remember these in order to solve kinematics problems faster.
